section.section: A prospective bidder or offeror, a bidder, or an offeror may submit a protest to the procurement officer.
A unit or a person who has been awarded a procurement contract may submit a contract claim to the procurement officer.

text.section: Except as provided in § 15-219 of this subtitle, a protest or contract claim shall be submitted within the time required under regulations adopted by the primary procurement unit responsible for the procurement.
